Package org.forgerock.openam.uma

Class PendingRequestsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.uma.PendingRequestsService
  • public class PendingRequestsService
extends Object
    Service class responsible for creating, reading, querying, approving and denying UMA Pending Requests.
    Since:
    13.0.0

        Constructs a new PendingRequestsService instance.

        store - An instance of the UMA Pending Requests TokenDataStore.
        auditLogger - An instance of the UmaAuditLogger.
        settingsFactory - An instance of the UmaProviderSettingsFactory.
        emailService - An instance of the UmaEmailService.
        pendingRequestEmailTemplate - An instance of the PendingRequestEmailTemplate.
        policyService - An instance of the UmaPolicyService.
        baseURLProviderFactory - An instance of the BaseUrlProviderFactory.
        coreWrapper - An instance of the CoreWrapper.

      • createPendingRequest

        public void createPendingRequest​(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpRequest,
                                 String resourceSetId,
                                 String resourceSetName,
                                 String resourceOwnerId,
                                 String requestingPartyId,
                                 String realm,
                                 Set<String> scopes)
                          throws ServerException
        Creates a pending request.
        Parameters:
        httpRequest - The HttpServletRequest.
        resourceSetId - The resource set id.
        resourceSetName - The resource set name.
        resourceOwnerId - The resource owner id.
        requestingPartyId - The requesting party id.
        realm - The realm.
        scopes - The requested scopes.
        Throws:
        ServerException - If the pending request could not be created.

        Parameters:
        id - The id of the request.
        Returns:
        The pending request.
        Throws:
        org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException - If the pending request could not be read or does not exist.

        Parameters:
        resourceOwnerId - The resource owner id.
        realm - The realm.
        Returns:
        A Set of pending requests.
        Throws:
        org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException - If the pending requests query failed.

                                                   String requestingPartyId)
                                            throws ServerException

        Parameters:
        resourceSetId - The resource set id.
        resourceOwnerId - The resource owner id.
        realm - The realm.
        requestingPartyId - The requesting party id.
        Returns:
        A Set of pending requests.
        Throws:
        ServerException - If the pending requests query failed.

      • approvePendingRequest

        public org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise<Void,​org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException> approvePendingRequest​(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context,
                                                                                                                          String id,
                                                                                                                          org.forgerock.json.JsonValue content,
                                                                                                                          String realm)
        Approves the pending request with the specified id.
        Parameters:
        context - The request context.
        id - The pending request id.
        content - The content of the approval request.
        realm - The current realm. @return Promise which is completed successfully or failed with a ResourceException.

      • denyPendingRequest

        public void denyPendingRequest​(String id,
                               String realm)
                        throws org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException
        Denies the pending request with the specified id.
        Parameters:
        id - The pending request id.
        realm - The current realm.
        Throws:
        org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException - If the pending request is not found or could not be marked as denied.
